experienceText:
STATE HYDROGRAPHIC SERVICE OF UKRAINE
Head of the repair and restoration base
2019 – ongoing
Duties: management of the repair and restoration base (30 employees)
summaryText:
I am seeking to be a part of a friendly and professional team where I can develop my skills in creating and maintaining user interfaces with a variety of functionality, while being a valuable member of the team by utilising and expanding my current skill set.
   I am particularly interested in working with React, JavaScript, and the Material UI framework, as well as in creating non-template web designs.
   My immediate goals are to learn new development tools and technologies, as well as undertaking practical work with database management systems such as MongoDB. My long term goals are to gain and develop my skills and knowledge and grow my career within the IT industry.
pharmacyTechnologies: Technologies used: React, Redux-toolkit, React-router, React Testing Library, JEST, Axios, Formik, Yup, HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, Vite, MUI, Postman, MongoDB, NodeJS, Express, Cloudinary, Git, Responsive web Design
pharmacyDescription: Description: an online pharmacy with the possibility of registration and the availability of a personal office. The main possibilities have been implemented: product filtering by categories, price, form, manufacturer, etc.; product and pharmacy reviews; purchase of goods with receipt of a confirmation letter by mail; chat with a pharmacist; adding products to Favorites and Cart; reviewed and promotional items
pharmacyRole: Role in the project: creation of a page displaying products by category (ProductsPage component), the logic of displaying goods by category, formation of a product request line, product filtering by parameters, logic transfer of filtering to the address term (searchParams), pagination
shopTechnologies: Technologies used: React, Hooks, Redux, Redux-thunk, React-router, React Testing Library, JEST, Fetch, Formik, Yup, HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, Responsive web Design
shopDescription: Description: a webpage of an online store with the option to add and remove items to Favorites and Cart (separate pages). The following has been implemented in the project: the option to purchase goods by filling out a form; and the option to view listed items displayed as cards or table
independentRole: Role in the project: : independent project development
cardsTechnologies: Technologies used: HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, Fetch, Gulp, Responsive web Design, REST API
cardsDescription: Description: a webpage where a receptionist can create cards containing information regarding scheduled specialist appointments. The following has been implemented in the project: the option to create, edit and delete visit cards stored on the server, and to filter visits by urgency, particular specialist, or purpose of the visit
forkioTechnologies: Technologies used: HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, Gulp, Responsive web Design
forkioDescription: Description: the site was created taking into account the principles of adaptive layout. The project build is configured using Gulp
humDescription: Description: the site is designed only for wide-format monitors with a screen width of 1200 pixels or more
